attributes.action: abolish the Scottish Parliament and Government on the basis that it benefits no one in this Country and is a Waste of Money.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Scottish Parliament has no real decision making powers and was established as a way of apeasing nationalist feelings in Scotland. The sum of money spent on the Building is ridiculous and the building would be better used by the University of Edinburgh or the NHS.  The decision making powers and the voting structure would be better handled centrally in London.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
